name: Ralf Rottmann | @ralf
tagline: grandcentrix founder. former the next web editor. open web addict and developer at heart.
body:
### About me
My name is Ralf Rottmann.

I’m a serial entrepreneur who sold his last company to Alcatel-Lucent and now serves as the CTO at [grandcentrix](http://en.grandcentrix.net).

In 2010, Germany’s renowned WirtschaftsWoche put me on it’s [List of Best Known Serial Entrepreneurs](http://rottmann.net/2010/11/serial-entrepreneuers-germany/) and I’ve been added to the [World’s Top 100 iOS iPhone Programmers](http://sparkah.com/guerrilla-marketing-strategies/worlds-top-100-ios-iphone-programmers-and-developers-who-know-objective-c/). My stories for the [SVBTLE community](https://svbtle.com/about) are available at [ralfrottmann.net](http://ralfrottmann.net/).

Find me: [rottmann.net](http://rottmann.net), [Google+](https://plus.google.com/+RalfRottmann/posts), [LinkedIn](http://de.linkedin.com/in/rottmann), App.net ([@ralf](http://alpha.app.net/ralf)), Twitter ([@ralf](http://twitter.com/ralf)) and [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/ralfrottmann).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
